name: Wario Pill's Pill-Based Journey!
description:
DISCLAIMER:

This game may cause seizures. Please beware and don't die.

Wario Pill needs to beat Mario Pill so he decides to grasp every single HappyWeed in order to win the world.

All you gotta do is gather every single HappyWeed and avoid the Donkey Kong and Minion pills to win.
If you touch anything that isn't a HappyWeed, then you die!
(Remember: Every time you die, you have to start from the very beginning of the level.)

Newgrounds version: https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/780992

Controls:

WASD Keys
